DOC.detailed_description: Heart Rate Variability ( HRV ) . HRV two domain , time domain frequency domain . SDNN ( Standard Deviation Normal Normal ) first time domain . In healthy state , signal diversity SDNN high . Decrease SDNN mean ability maintain homeostasis reduce . It show person disease state . Significant decrease HRV indicator general health . PSI ( Physical Stress Index ) pressure load state due overload physical activity heart rate increase . Total power ( TP ) , Very low frequency ( VLF ) , Low frequency ( LF ) , High frequency ( HF ) , normalize Low frequency ( nLF , LF norm ) = LF/ ( LF +HF ) , normalize High frequency ( nHF , HF norm ) = HF/ ( LF+HF ) Low frequency High frequency ratio ( LF/HF ) frequency domain . Mean Heart rate ( MHR ) also indicator represent autonomic function . Range study : It do April - May 2016 . Population Enrollment recruitment do select volunteer 100 participant . Investigator : Training investigator select psychologist , technician , nurse , medical student hospital health colleague . Certified attend class training , assessment evaluation do study . Maneuver : Instruments questionnaires HRV measurement SA-3000P . Fast Fourier Transformation method ( FFT ) apply underlie . Finger probe use five minute comfort sit upright position . Normal respiration heavy pay attention monitor look wall . Enough sleeping night study take coffee , drug , alcohol smoking two hour study . Variables : HRT , Heart rate ; SDNN , Standard deviation normal normal interval ; RMSSD , square root mean square difference successive NN interval ; PSI , Physical stress index ; ApEn , Approximate Entropy ; SRD , Successive R-R interval difference ; TSRD , Total SRD ; TP , Total power ; VLF , Very low frequency ; LF , Low frequency ; HF , High frequency ; nLF , normalized LF ; nHF , normalized HF . Statistical analysis : We use descriptive study report percent , mean , standard deviation , median , inter quartile range . Independent t-test ANOVA use parametric test . Pearson Chi-square Test , Mann-Whitney U Test , Kruskal-Wallis Test , Kolmogorov-Smirnov Z Test , Wald-Wolfowitz Test use nonparametric test . Significance statistical analysis 0.05 95 % confidence interval . Units SDNN millisecond ( m ) TP , VLF , LF , HF square millisecond ( ms2 ) multiply 100 .
